```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```

Import

```{r}
df <- read.csv("breast-cancer.csv")
```

Convert y variable to factor

```{r}
df <- df |>
  mutate(diagnosis = as.factor(diagnosis))
```

Partition

```{r}
set.seed(123)

train_index <- createDataPartition(df$diagnosis, p = 0.7, list = FALSE)

train <- df[train_index, ]
test <- df[-train_index, ]
```

Data Exploration

```{r}
colSums(is.na(df))
```

```{r}
ggplot(train, aes(x = diagnosis)) +
  geom_bar()
```
